<b> Welcome! </b>

I am a Research Associate at the Computational Communication Research Group, Department of Communication, Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz. My research focuses on political communication across social media platforms, employing advanced quantitative methods with an emphasis on machine learning techniques and large language models (LLMs).

This website serves as a central place for my academic, professional, and personal activities. If you want to know more about me, head over to the [about page](about.qmd).
